description:
It`s almost time for Dream Fes, and DearDream has made the daring decision to enter the festival with an original song. They manage to find someone to compose it for them, but Shin, who`s been tasked with writing the lyrics, is drawing a blank. Can DearDear complete their song in time?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Feeling We Want to Hold High!!!!!
